price: Alimwambia baba yake na watu wake: Mnaabudu nini?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعۡبُدُونَ
footnotes: Alipo chukia kuwa baba yake na watu wake wanaabudu masanamu, akawaambia: Ni nini haya masanamu mnayo yaabudu?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mādhā taʿbudūna
